SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Remembering to do important things?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Remembering to Do Important Things

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Analysing and finding solutions to problems in day-to-day life?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Finding Solutions to Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Learning a New Task

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Generally understanding what people say?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Understanding What People Say

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Starting and maintaining a conversation?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Starting or Maintaining Conversation

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Standing for Long Periods

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Standing up from sitting down?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Standing Up From Sitting Down

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Moving around inside their home?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Moving Around Inside Their Home

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Washing his or her whole body?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Washing His or Her Whole Body

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting dressed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Dressed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Eating?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Eating

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Staying by Him/Herself a Few Days
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Staying by himself or herself for a few days?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Staying by Him or Herself a Few Days

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Dealing With People Does Not Know
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Dealing with people he or she does not know?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Dealing With People Does Not Know

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Maintaining a friendship?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Maintaining a Friendship

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Get Along With People Close to Him
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting along with people who are close to him or her?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Get Along With People Close to Him

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Making new friends?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Making New Friends

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Sexual activities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Sexual Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Taking care of his or her household responsibilities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Doing his or her most important household tasks well?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Doing Important Household Tasks

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting all the household work done that is needed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Household Work Done Needed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting the household work done as quickly as needed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Household Work Done Quickly

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: His or her day-to-day work/school?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Their Day-to-Day Work or School

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Doing his or her most important work/school tasks well?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Doing Important Work or School Tasks

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Getting All Work Done You Need
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting all the work done that is needed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting All Work Done You Need

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting the work done as quickly as needed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have in joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Problem Because of Barriers in World
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have because of barriers or hindrances in the world around him or her?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Because of Barriers in World

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have living with dignity because of the attitudes and actions of others?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Living with Dignity

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Time Spend on Your Health Condition
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much time did your relative spend on his or her health condition, or its consequences?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Time Spend on Your Health Condition

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much has your relative been emotionally affected by his or her health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much has his or her health been a drain on his or her financial resources or on the financial resources of other relatives?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Drain on Financial Resources

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you or the rest of his or her family have because of his or her health problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Did Your Family Have

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have in doing things by himself or herself for relaxation or pleasure?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Doing Things for Relaxation

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, for how many days was your relative totally unable to carry out his or her usual activities or work because of any health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that your relative was totally unable, for how many days did your relative cut back or reduce his or her usual activities or work because of any health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD6-I Am (Fill in Blank) of This Person
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - I am the (Fill in the Blank) of this person.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - I Am (Fill in the Blank) of this Person

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting out of their home?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Out of Their Home

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Walking a Long Distance
